# AttributeAlignment.MakePaddingOnly method

Make an AttributeAlignment that is padding only.

```csharp
public static AttributeAlignment MakePaddingOnly(int alignWidth)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| alignWidth | Value width for alignment |

## Return Value

A new padding-only AttributeAlignment
